content:
Despite its name sounding as if it belonged to a European metal outfit Centralia Massacre hopes that above all else we fall more into the folk category. no this is not some strange metalfolk hybrid just a folkbluegrass band with an amusing name PERIOD Formed in Knoxville in  the band incorporates elements of folk jazz oldcountry and blues said guitarist Laura Bost PERIOD Other members are James Maples on banjo and guitar the other founding member of the band along with Bost upright bassist Johnny Walker and drummer Steve Corrigan PERIOD All members are University of Tennessee alumni PERIOD

We enjoy being Knoxville musicians. bost said PERIOD We are proud of the growing folk community here and our fellow hometown musicians. the band has been compared to Over the Rhine and The Everybodyfields Bost said PERIOD However on some tracks a listener might also hear vocals reminiscent of indie rock or a harmonica that sounds straight out of the Adventures of Pete  Pete soundtrack PERIOD

Bost said Centralia Massacre is proud of what she calls their DIY sensibility. we record everything ourselves and we love to have our friends represented in the artwork and production process of recording an album Bost said PERIOD

Centralia has produced one album so far 2008s Right at Home a 10song LP that is available at the bands Web site PERIOD Bost said that there is another album in the works right now PERIOD

We should have it out in the late spring she said PERIOD

To promote the record the band will head out on the road which for Centralia Massacre stretches far beyond Knoxvilles city limits PERIOD

We will be headed to Kentucky Ohio New York Pennsylvania West Virginia Virginia and probably Indiana and Illinois before the summer is over Bost said PERIOD In the future we really want to go to Canada and points further west. on Monday Centralia will perform at Barleys Taproom at  p.m PERIOD That particular performance will see the band feature Leslie Terry on fiddle and John Clerx on blues harp adding an extra layer to their already full sound PERIOD Bost said that the bands makes a conscious effort to incorporate different musicians other than the bands four members at each show PERIOD

The bands lives are eclectic blends of many elements some more usual that others PERIOD

Electric banjos ukuleles whistling solos lots of harmony and an amazing drummer and bassist holding it all together Bost said of what to expect at a Centralia Massacre live PERIOD

But at every show there will be lots of songs that make you want to snuggle with the stranger beside you she added PERIOD

. the Rock will also welcome Centralia Massacre to their airwaves on Monday at  p.m PERIOD The show at Barleys will begin at  p.m PERIOD and is free to the public PERIOD
